definition: to lay down one's arms/to surrender/to disarm
to hand in/to hand over/to seize
gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots
surname Qiang
variant of 槍|枪[qiang1]/rifle/spear
“surrender and your life will be spared”

sentences.english: On September 13 we defeated Liu Shih-yi, captured several hundred rifles and took Suichuan.
sentences.chinese: 九月十三日，我军击败刘士毅，缴枪数百，占领。

sentences.english: They are more cocooned today by their agents or the press they receive.
sentences.chinese: 他们现在更容易向经纪人或者媒体缴枪。
